hero.title: Your Solution Partner in Turkey
hero.description: We turn your dreams into reality with our professional consulting services, becoming your reliable solution partner in life and investment processes in Turkey. We provide specialized services for all your needs with our expert team

residence.title: Residence Permit
residence.description: We professionally manage your legal residence permit processes in Turkey. We offer fast and reliable solutions especially for work permit and student residence permit applications. Our expert team follows all legal processes on your behalf.

realestate.title: Real Estate
realestate.description: We connect you with the best investment opportunities. By conducting detailed market research tailored to your budget and needs, we offer you the most suitable and profitable real estate options. We provide professional support at every stage.

automobile.title: Automotive
automobile.description: We are with you in vehicle buying and selling processes. We meticulously research vehicles within your budget, examining them down to the finest detail as if we were buying for ourselves. We protect you against potential fraud by offering the most logical and reliable options.

trade.title: Business Consulting
trade.description: We provide expert support in business establishment and development processes. With our experienced lawyers and accountants, we are with you throughout your commercial activities in Turkey. We provide professional support in both buying and selling operations, working for your business success.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.experienceDesc: Our expert team offers reliable consulting with years of industry knowledge.
whyUs.supportDesc: We are always here for you, ready to assist at any time of day.
whyUs.successDesc: We have successfully assisted thousands of clients with their needs in Turkey.
whyUs.trustDesc: Client trust and satisfaction are at the core of everything we do.

items.name: Amir Hosseini
items.comment: My tourist residence permit application was rejected twice and I didn't know what to do. After consulting with Visano, we started the student residence permit process and I got my permit within 10 days. Now I'm attending university in Istanbul.

items.name: Nazanin Karimi
items.comment: I wanted to work in Turkey but the processes seemed very complicated. Visano managed my work visa application from start to finish. I didn't have to deal with any paperwork, they handled everything. Now I run my own business in Istanbul.

items.name: Mehdi Rezaei
items.comment: I wanted to buy an apartment in Turkey but I was afraid of being scammed since I didn't know the language. Visano handled everything from property research to deed transactions on my behalf. I know I made a reliable investment.

items.name: Fatemeh Ahmadi
items.comment: I applied to many places for a residence permit but kept getting rejected. I reached out to Visano on a friend's recommendation, and they got my student residence permit very quickly. They also helped me buy a car and managed the entire process.

items.name: Ali Mohammadi
items.comment: I wanted to start a business in Turkey but had no idea about the legal processes. Visano was by my side from company setup to work visa, from vehicle purchase to accounting. I could never have done it alone.

items.name: Parisa Darvishi
items.comment: My husband and I wanted to settle in Turkey. Visano managed the residence permit process for our family and helped us find a suitable home. They were with us throughout the entire purchase process, we never felt alone.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Your Reliable Solution Partner for Life and Investment in Turkey

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Visano was born with the vision of bringing different cultures together to serve a common purpose. Our company, whose foundations were laid in 2022, officially started its operations in 2025. The intersection of paths of a Turkish and an Iranian entrepreneur has turned into a success story serving thousands of people today.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: As a team that has personally experienced the challenges faced by foreigners coming to Turkey, we aim to make these processes safer, more transparent, and easier for everyone.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.content: Our founding story began with the challenges one of our partners faced while settling in Turkey. Problems in the residence permit process, fraud cases, and encountered difficulties led us to produce professional solutions in this field. These experiences shaped our vision and strengthened our determination to provide our clients with the most reliable service.
